channel.title: CANBUS e-golf Battery INFO help
channel.description:
Hello all. i would like to get SOC of my ev e-golf from OBD2 but i tried to request 0x7DF, 07E0 for 022101 022102 without respone. anyone has idea for e-golf?
Thank you very much
Kong
